item.title: Daddy Wants a BlackBerry
item.description: With Father’s Day around the corner, forget the usual tie or car-related gifts. This year, give Dad what he truly desires: a cutting-edge BlackBerry Bold for both work and personal use. And here’s a secret: you can find it online at a great price. The BlackBerry Bold combines style and functionality. Its sleek black design exudes professionalism and practicality. This BlackBerry boasts an impressive email client with the renowned “push” email feature, seamlessly integrating up to 10 accounts.

item.title: BlackBerry's Bold Move to HSDPA
item.description: BlackBerry, the company known for its wireless devices, is launching a new model called “Bold” with enhanced features like a sharper display, increased storage, a faster processor, and a 2-megapixel camera. However, the most significant advancement lies in its connectivity. The Bold surpasses standard EDGE data services by incorporating tri-band HSDPA and Wi-Fi, catering to the growing demand for desktop-like web browsing and video streaming among professionals. Adding to the excitement, rumors are circulating about Apple’s iPhone selling out in anticipation of a new model featuring HSDPA technology.
